title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

of State at the Department of Foreign Affairs) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department foreign affairs) order 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 2. Eoin Delaney, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Eoin Delaney, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Foreign Affairs, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to Seán Fleming, Minister of State at the Department of Foreign Affairs, with 
effect from 9 April 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

5 November, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [711] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
